mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOK_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHECK_IN,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(CHECK_OUT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_OUT, BOOK_ADULTCOUNT, PRICE, CASE ROOM_PROCESS WHEN 0 THEN '예약대기' WHEN -1 THEN '예약취소' ELSE '예약확정' END AS ROOM_PROCESS , BOOK_CARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, NONMEMBER_NO, PROMOTION_NO, ROOM_VIEW_NO, ROOM_TYPE_NO, BOOK_CHILDCOUNT, BOOK_ROOMCOUNT, GUEST_NO, BED_TYPE_NO, (SELECT PROMOTION_TITLE FROM PROMOTION P WHERE P.PROMOTION_NO=BOOK.PROMOTION_NO) PROMOTION_TITLE FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOOK_NO, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOK_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHECK_IN,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(CHECK_OUT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_OUT, BOOK_ADULTCOUNT, PRICE, CASE ROOM_PROCESS WHEN 0 THEN '예약대기' WHEN -1 THEN '예약취소' ELSE '예약확정' END AS ROOM_PROCESS , BOOK_CARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, NONMEMBER_NO, PROMOTION_NO, ROOM_VIEW_NO, ROOM_TYPE_NO, BOOK_CHILDCOUNT, BOOK_ROOMCOUNT, GUEST_NO, BED_TYPE_NO, (SELECT PROMOTION_TITLE FROM PROMOTION P WHERE P.PROMOTION_NO=BOOK.PROMOTION_NO) PROMOTION_TITLE FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK.BOOK_NO=#{nonMemberBookNo}

SELECT BOOK_NO, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOK_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHECK_IN,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(CHECK_OUT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_OUT, BOOK_ADULTCOUNT, PRICE, CASE ROOM_PROCESS WHEN 0 THEN '예약대기' WHEN -1 THEN '예약취소' ELSE '예약확정' END AS ROOM_PROCESS , BOOK_CARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, NONMEMBER_NO, PROMOTION_NO, ROOM_VIEW_NO, ROOM_TYPE_NO, BOOK_CHILDCOUNT, BOOK_ROOMCOUNT, GUEST_NO, BED_TYPE_NO, (SELECT PROMOTION_TITLE FROM PROMOTION P WHERE P.PROMOTION_NO=BOOK.PROMOTION_NO) PROMOTION_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, NONMEMBER_NAME, NONMEMBER_PHONE, NONMEMBER_EMAIL, (SELECT CHECK_OUT-CHECK_IN FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}) NIGHTS
FROM BOOK JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN NONMEMBER USING (NONMEMBER_NO) JOIN GUEST USING (GUEST_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
SELECT BOOK_NO, OPTION_NO, OPTION_PRICE, BOOK_DATE, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_CNT FROM BOOK_OPTION JOIN "OPTION" USING (OPTION_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO=#{book_no}
